verbs.description: By [V: building] [ARG1: a personal rapport with the North Korean dictator] , Trump is at least in a position to ask for what he wants .
[ARGM-MNR: By building a personal rapport with the North Korean dictator] , [ARG1: Trump] [V: is] [ARGM-ADV: at least] [ARG2: in a position to ask for what he wants] .
By building a personal rapport with the North Korean dictator , [ARG0: Trump] is at least in [ARGM-LOC: a position] to [V: ask] [ARG1: for what he wants] .
By building a personal rapport with the North Korean dictator , Trump is at least in a position to ask for [ARG1: what] [ARG0: he] [V: wants] .
